import React from "react" import { Form, Button, InputGroup, ForControl } from "react-bootstrap" const InputMovement = () => { const [amount, setAmount] = React.useState(0) const [concept, setConcept] = React.useState("") const [typeM, setTypeM] = React.useState("I") const [dateM, setDateM] = React.useState("") const onSubmitForm = async e => { // Handle the form submitted // Prevent from refresh e.preventDefault() try { const body = { amount, concept, typeM, dateM } const response = await fetch("http://localhost:5000/movements", { method: "POST", headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json" }, body: JSON.stringify(body) }) // Once the response has been sent, itś going to refresh and show the changes window.location = "/" } catch (err) { console.error(err.message) } } return (
